languages.text: Я никогда не забуду, как его пламенеющий под огнем макропушек остов взломал купол мануфакторума. Увы, траектория полета "Праведного искупления" была рассчитана не идеально. Фрегат слишком рано потерял высоту и рухнул на землю, пропахав корпусом наши боевые порядки. Но его плазменный двигатель не отказал, и фрегат, снося все на своем пути, вонзился во вражеский крейсер. Оба они исчезли в ослепительной вспышке.

traits.locale_text: Я никогда не забуду, как его пламенеющий под огнем макропушек остов, на полном ходу прорезал облака смога. Сильно потеряв высоту из-за шквального огня противника, "Праведное искупление" рухнул на землю, прополов пять дивизий наших солдат. Но его плазменный двигатель не отказал, и фрегат, снося все на своем пути, вонзился во вражейский крейсер, забрав его с собой.

languages.text: I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls. Alas, the flight trajectory of the Righteous Redemption was flawed. She began to lose altitude too early and crashed into the ground, ploughing straight through our ranks. But her plasma drive stayed strong, and the frigate, after destroying everything in her path, pierced the enemy cruiser. Both perished in a blinding flash.
languages.original_text: Я никогда не забуду, как его пламенеющий под огнем макропушек остов взломал купол мануфакторума. Увы, траектория полета "Праведного искупления" была рассчитана не идеально. Фрегат слишком рано потерял высоту и рухнул на землю, пропахав корпусом наши боевые порядки. Но его плазменный двигатель не отказал, и фрегат, снося все на своем пути, вонзился во вражеский крейсер. Оба они исчезли в ослепительной вспышке.

traits.locale_text: I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls. Alas, the flight trajectory of the Righteous Redemption was flawed. She began to lose altitude too early and crashed into the ground, ploughing straight through our ranks. But her plasma drive stayed strong, and the frigate, after destroying everything in her path, pierced the enemy cruiser. Both perished in a blinding flash.

She began to lose altitude too early and crashed into the ground, ploughing straight through our ranks. languages.text: 我永远不会忘记当时的那一幕——她的舰体被宏炮的烈焰点燃，笔直地撞入了制造工厂。当遗憾的是，正义救赎号的飞行轨迹存在误差。它过早地降低了高度，撞在了地面上，直接穿过了我们的队伍。不过，它的等离子动力依然非常强劲。它摧毁了路径上的一切障碍之后，刺穿了敌人那艘巡洋舰的舰身。两艘战舰在爆炸中消失了，迸发出夺目的光芒。
languages.original_text: I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls. Alas, the flight trajectory of the Righteous Redemption was flawed. She began to lose altitude too early and crashed into the ground, ploughing straight through our ranks. But her plasma drive stayed strong, and the frigate, after destroying everything in her path, pierced the enemy cruiser. Both perished in a blinding flash.

traits.locale_text: 我永远不会忘记当时的那一幕——她的舰体被宏炮的烈焰点燃，笔直地撞入了制造工厂。当遗憾的是，正义救赎号的飞行轨迹存在误差。它过早地降低了高度，撞在了地面上，直接穿过了我们的队伍。不过，它的等离子动力依然非常强劲。它摧毁了路径上的一切障碍之后，刺穿了敌人那艘巡洋舰的舰身。两艘战舰在爆炸中消失了，迸发出夺目的光芒。

languages.text: Je n'oublierai jamais la vue de sa coque, embrasée par les tirs des macro-canons, s'écrasant dans le manufactorum. Hélas, la trajectoire de vol du « Délivrance impartiale » manquait de précision. Le vaisseau a commencé à perdre de l'altitude trop rapidement et s'est écrasé au beau milieu de nos rangs. Malgré tout, son réacteur à plasma a tenu bon et, après avoir tout détruit sur son passage, la frégate est parvenue à perforer le croiseur ennemi, détruisant du même coup les deux appareils dans un flash aveuglant.
languages.original_text: I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls. Alas, the flight trajectory of the Righteous Redemption was flawed. She began to lose altitude too early and crashed into the ground, ploughing straight through our ranks. But her plasma drive stayed strong, and the frigate, after destroying everything in her path, pierced the enemy cruiser. Both perished in a blinding flash.

traits.locale_text: Je n'oublierai jamais la vue de sa coque, embrasée par les tirs des macro-canons, s'écrasant dans le manufactorum. Hélas, la trajectoire de vol du « Délivrance impartiale » manquait de précision. Le vaisseau a commencé à perdre de l'altitude trop rapidement et s'est écrasé au beau milieu de nos rangs. Malgré tout, son réacteur à plasma a tenu bon et, après avoir tout détruit sur son passage, la frégate est parvenue à perforer le croiseur ennemi, détruisant du même coup les deux appareils dans un flash aveuglant.

languages.text: マクロキャノンの砲火で燃え上がった船体が聖工場の広間に激突した光景が脳裏に刻まれている。残念なことに、正義の贖罪の飛行軌道には欠陥があった。高度を下げるのが早すぎたせいか地面に激突し、我々の隊列を直撃した。しかし、艦隊のプラズマドライブは強力なままであり、フリゲート艦は進路上のすべてを破壊した後、敵の巡洋艦を貫いた。まばゆい閃光の中、両艦とも消滅した。
languages.original_text: I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls. Alas, the flight trajectory of the Righteous Redemption was flawed. She began to lose altitude too early and crashed into the ground, ploughing straight through our ranks. But her plasma drive stayed strong, and the frigate, after destroying everything in her path, pierced the enemy cruiser. Both perished in a blinding flash.

traits.locale_text: マクロキャノンの砲火で燃え上がった船体が聖工場の広間に激突した光景が脳裏に刻まれている。残念なことに、正義の贖罪の飛行軌道には欠陥があった。高度を下げるのが早すぎたせいか地面に激突し、我々の隊列を直撃した。しかし、艦隊のプラズマドライブは強力なままであり、フリゲート艦は進路上のすべてを破壊した後、敵の巡洋艦を貫いた。まばゆい閃光の中、両艦とも消滅した。

languages.text: Nunca olvidaré cómo su casco, ardiendo por los impactos de macrocañones, atravesó las salas del manufactorum. Sin embargo, la trayectoria de la Redención Justiciera era errónea. Empezó a perder altura demasiado pronto y golpeó el suelo, atravesando nuestras filas. Pero su motor de plasma siguió activo y la fragata, después de aplastarlo todo a su paso, atravesó el crucero enemigo. Ambas naves fueron consumidas por un fogonazo cegador.
languages.original_text: I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls. Alas, the flight trajectory of the Righteous Redemption was flawed. She began to lose altitude too early and crashed into the ground, ploughing straight through our ranks. But her plasma drive stayed strong, and the frigate, after destroying everything in her path, pierced the enemy cruiser. Both perished in a blinding flash.

traits.locale_text: Nunca olvidaré cómo su casco, ardiendo por los impactos de macrocañones, atravesó las salas del manufactorum. Sin embargo, la trayectoria de la Redención Justiciera era errónea. Empezó a perder altura demasiado pronto y golpeó el suelo, atravesando nuestras filas. Pero su motor de plasma siguió activo y la fragata, después de aplastarlo todo a su paso, atravesó el crucero enemigo. Ambas naves fueron consumidas por un fogonazo cegador.

languages.text: Ich werde nie den Anblick vergessen, wie die Hülle des Schiffs, vom Feuer der Makrokanonen in Brand gesetzt, in die Hallen des Manufactorums krachte. Leider war jedoch die Flugbahn der Rechtschaffene Erlösung nicht richtig berechnet worden. Sie begann zu früh, an Höhe zu verlieren, und krachte in den Boden, wobei sie geradewegs durch unsere Reihen pflügte. Doch ihr Plasmatriebwerk blieb stark, und nachdem die Fregatte alles zerstört hatte, was ihr im Weg stand, durchbohrte sie den feindlichen Kreuzer. Beide wurden in einer gleißenden Explosion zerstört.
languages.original_text: I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls. Alas, the flight trajectory of the Righteous Redemption was flawed. She began to lose altitude too early and crashed into the ground, ploughing straight through our ranks. But her plasma drive stayed strong, and the frigate, after destroying everything in her path, pierced the enemy cruiser. Both perished in a blinding flash.

Beide wurden in einer gleißenden Explosion zerstört.

languages.text: Makro top ateşiyle tutuşan gövdesinin, manufaktorum salonlarına çarpışını asla unutmayacağım. Ne yazık ki Efdal Kefaret'in uçuş rotası kusurluydu. Erkenden irtifa kaybetmeye başlayıp yere çakılarak doğrudan bizim saflarımıza daldı. Yine de plazma iticisi dayandı; rotasındaki her şeyi yok eden fırkateyn, düşman gemisini yarıp geçti. İki gemi de kör edici bir patlamayla yitip gitti.
languages.original_text: I will never forget the sight of her hull, set ablaze by the macro-cannon fire, crashing into the manufactorum halls. Alas, the flight trajectory of the Righteous Redemption was flawed. She began to lose altitude too early and crashed into the ground, ploughing straight through our ranks. But her plasma drive stayed strong, and the frigate, after destroying everything in her path, pierced the enemy cruiser. Both perished in a blinding flash.
